mapper.select: SELECT drs.id, m.name, m.mobile, hd.address, drs.ship_name, drs.ship_mobile, drs.total_price, h.id FROM dj_delivery_return_slip drs INNER JOIN dj_order o ON drs.order_id = o.id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = o.house_id INNER JOIN dj_house_address hd ON hd.house_id = h.id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON h.member_id=m.id where drs.id=#{id}

SELECT m.NAME as workerName, m.mobile as workerMobile FROM dj_house h INNER JOIN dj_core_house_flow chf ON h.id = chf.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.id = chf.worker_id WHERE chf.worker_type_id = 3 AND h.id = #{houeId}
